body:
It looks like test/bench/shootout leaves behind .o and .out/.exe files.
Sending a fix to remedy that. We should probably put a check in dist to
cause all.bash to fail if tests leave files behind in the tree, but for 1.6.

On 31 July 2015 at 11:26, Andrew Gerrand <adg@golang.org> wrote:

> I'm running a test now to see what all.bash leaves behind.
>
> On 31 July 2015 at 02:26, Russ Cox <notifications@github.com> wrote:
>
>> The more I think about this, the more it seems like we should run
>> all.bash.
>>
>> â€”
>> Reply to this email directly or view it on GitHub
>> <https://github.com/golang/go/issues/11943#issuecomment-126392729>.
>>
>
>
